mapper.select: select table_order_id, table_order_num, table_order_end, table_order_date from table_order
select table_order_id, table_order_num, table_order_end, table_order_date from table_order where table_order_id = #{table_order_id}
select table_order_id, menu_id, menu_name, order_detail_ea, order_detail_sum from order_detail where table_order_id= #{table_order_id}
